text: Alisa Kwitney is a writer of comedic romance novels and graphic novels. ==Biography== Kwitney grew up in New York City, on Manhattan's Upper West Side,"Alisa Kwitney: From the Author". Amazon.com. Retrieved November 15, 2012. the daughter of science fiction author Robert Sheckley and Ziva Kwitney. Alisa Kwitney has a BA in English from Wesleyan University, where she received the Horgan Writing Prize for Fiction, and an MFA in fiction from Columbia University, where she received a scholarship of merit. Her master's thesis was published by HarperCollins as her first novel, Till The Fat Lady Sings, in 1991. Kwitney was an editor for Vertigo Comics. She is currently the editor for Liminal Comics at Brain Mill Press. Kwitney lives in an old farmhouse two hours from Manhattan with her husband and two children. ==Bibliography== ===Novels=== * Till The Fat Lady Sings (1991) * The Dominant Blonde published by Avon Books in June, 2002 * Does She or Doesn't She?
